sqlMap.select: SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.LEVEL_ID, A.LEVEL_NAME, T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_2_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#) T, (SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = #areaNo# OR A.PARENT_ID = #areaNo# ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID, A.ORD) A WHERE T.ORG_ID(+) = A.LEVEL_ID

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.LEVEL_ID, A.LEVEL_NAME, ROUND(T.KPI_01*100,2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_02*100,2) KPI_02, ROUND(T.KPI_03*100,2) KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_2_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#) T, (SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = 'root' OR A.PARENT_ID = 'root' ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID, A.ORD) A WHERE T.ORG_ID(+) = A.LEVEL_ID
SELECT ROUND(T.KPI_01 * 100, 2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_02 * 100, 2) KPI_02, ROUND((T.KPI_01 - T.KPI_02) * 100, 2) KPI_1_2 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_2_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID=#areaNo#

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.LEVEL_ID, A.LEVEL_NAME, T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_3_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#) T, (SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = #areaNo# OR A.PARENT_ID = #areaNo# ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID, A.ORD) A WHERE T.ORG_ID(+) = A.LEVEL_ID

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.LEVEL_ID, A.LEVEL_NAME, ROUND(T.KPI_01*100,2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_02*100,2) KPI_02, ROUND(T.KPI_03*100,2) KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_3_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#) T, (SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = 'root' OR A.PARENT_ID = 'root' ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID, A.ORD) A WHERE T.ORG_ID(+) = A.LEVEL_ID
SELECT ROUND(T.KPI_01 * 100, 2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_02 * 100, 2) KPI_02, ROUND((T.KPI_01 - T.KPI_02) * 100, 2) KPI_1_2 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_3_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID=#areaNo#
SELECT ROUND(T.KPI_01 * 100, 2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_02 * 100, 2) KPI_02, ROUND((T.KPI_01 - T.KPI_02) * 100, 2) KPI_1_2 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_1_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID=#areaNo#

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.LEVEL_ID, A.LEVEL_NAME, T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_1_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#) T, (SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = #areaNo# OR A.PARENT_ID = #areaNo# ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID, A.ORD) A WHERE T.ORG_ID(+) = A.LEVEL_ID

SELECT T.MONTH_ID, A.LEVEL_ID, A.LEVEL_NAME, ROUND(T.KPI_01*100,2) KPI_01, ROUND(T.KPI_02*100,2) KPI_02, ROUND(T.KPI_03*100,2) KPI_03, T.KPI_04 FROM (SELECT * FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_1_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId#) T, (SELECT * FROM HN_DMCODE.DIM_NODE_ID_N_STATIC_V A WHERE A.LEVEL_ID = 'root' OR A.PARENT_ID = 'root' ORDER BY A.PARENT_ID, A.ORD) A WHERE T.ORG_ID(+) = A.LEVEL_ID

SELECT T.KPI_01, A.AREA_NO, A.AREA_DESC, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04, T.KPI_05, T.KPI_06, T.KPI_07 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_4_1 T, HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO

SELECT A.AREA_DESC,T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04, T.KPI_05, T.KPI_06 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_4_1 T,HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = #areaNo# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO
SELECT T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04, T.KPI_05, T.KPI_06, T.KPI_07 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_4_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = 'root'

SELECT T.KPI_01, A.AREA_NO, A.AREA_DESC, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04, T.KPI_05, T.KPI_06, T.KPI_07 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_5_1 T, HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO

SELECT A.AREA_DESC,T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04, T.KPI_05, T.KPI_06 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_5_1 T,HN_DMCODE.DMCODE_AREA_CW_VIEW A WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = #areaNo# AND T.ORG_ID = A.AREA_NO
SELECT T.KPI_01, T.KPI_02, T.KPI_03, T.KPI_04, T.KPI_05, T.KPI_06, T.KPI_07 FROM CW_DM.CW_RPT_ZHWG_5_1 T WHERE T.MONTH_ID = #monthId# AND T.ORG_ID = 'root'
